title: Otaku
description: Ashley's guilty pleasure is reading sexually explicit manga. After leaving her Japanese lover, who happened to be possessed by a ronin, a disgraced samurai, the manga was all the excitement she could get stateside. But, a lust demon has tracked her down and is determined to wrest control of Ashley's body in vengeance against the ronin. It's going to take her ex-boyfriend and all of Ashley's tough talking to defeat the demon.
author: Jamie K. Schmidt
